remarks: Value of the metric in a binary structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsds.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsds.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsds.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsds.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsds.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsds.p $e |- P = ( dist ` T ) $.
xpsds.m $e |- M = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
xpsds.n $e |- N = ( ( dist ` S ) |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
xpsds.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
xpsds.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) $.
xpsds.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
xpsds.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. Y ) $.
xpsds.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
xpsds.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Y ) $.
xpsdsval $p |- ( ph -> ( <. A , B >. P <. C , D >. ) = sup ( { ( A M C ) , ( B N D ) } , RR* , < ) ) $.
